title: BRIEF-Gildan Activewear Reports Q4 EPS $0.25
text: February 22, 2018 / 1:56 PM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-Gildan Activewear Reports Q4 EPS $0.25 Reuters Staff 2 Min Read Feb 22 (Reuters) - Gildan Activewear Inc: * GILDAN ACTIVEWEAR REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 EARNINGS AT TOP END OF GUIDANCE RANGE AND PROVIDES OUTLOOK FOR 2018 * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.31 EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.25 * Q4 SALES $653.7 MILLION * ‍SAYS 2018 GUIDANCE PROVIDES FOR LOW TO MID-SINGLE DIGIT SALES GROWTH AND ADJUSTED DILUTED EPS OF $1.80 TO $1.90​ * ‍SAYS PROJECTING TO GENERATE FREE CASH FLOW FOR 2018 OF APPROXIMATELY $400 MILLION​ * ‍SAYS AMERICAN APPAREL EXPECTED TO CONTRIBUTE NET SALES OF ABOUT $100 MILLION IN 2018, UP FROM APPROXIMATELY $50 MILLION IN 2017​ * ‍SAYS ADJUSTED EBITDA FOR 2018 IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $595 TO $620 MILLION​ * ‍SAYS FOR 2018, COMPANY IS PROJECTING CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF ABOUT $125 MILLION​ * GILDAN ACTIVEWEAR - ‍APPROVED 20% INCREASE IN AMOUNT OF CURRENT QTRLY DIVIDEND, DECLARED A CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.112 PER SHARE, PAYABLE ON APRIL 2, 2018​ * FY2017 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.71, REVENUE VIEW $2.73 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.31, REVENUE VIEW $634.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * GILDAN ACTIVEWEAR - REPORTS 2017 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.61, ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.72​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
